messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "doc_api_launch_planning_sync_notes_2025_11_20",
      "name": "API Launch Planning Sync – 2025-11-20 Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-20T16:10:00+09:00",
      "content": "API Launch Planning Sync – 2025-11-20
Time: 15:00–15:45 (KST)
Participants: Tom Park (PM, partner), Alice Kim, Min Lee, Dana Choi (optional)

Agenda
- Review APP-412 (Feature X rollout) QA status
- Discuss remaining API optimizations (APP-410 follow-ups)
- Confirm risks and dependencies before 2025-11-28 Launch

Notes
1) APP-412 – Feature X rollout
- Status: In QA, targeting sign-off by 2025-11-21.
- Plan: Pilot customers (incl. FinSync Corp from CS-9821) on 2025-11-24; GA with API Launch on 2025-11-28.

2) APP-410 – API optimizations
- Deployed 2025-11-18; P95 latency dropped from ~410ms to ~330ms (~20% improvement).
- Need additional monitoring as Feature X adoption increases.

3) Risks & Dependencies
- QA must complete on time; any critical bug pushes pilot.
- Coordinate with CS on messaging for FinSync and other partners.

Action Items
- Alice: confirm QA sign-off for APP-412 by EOD 2025-11-21.
- Tom: update weekly exec summary with Feature X ETA and latency + usage metrics.
- Dana: sync with support on CS-9821 response and launch comms."
    },
    {
      "id": "slides_api_launch_planning_deck_2025_11_20",
      "name": "API Launch Planning – Pre-sync Deck",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-19T18:40:00+09:00",
      "content": "Title: API Launch Planning Sync
Date: 2025-11-20
Owner: Tom Park

Slide 1 – Goals
- Align on status of key APP epics before QA / Launch milestones
- Confirm Feature X (APP-412) rollout plan and risks
- Summarize wins: latency and user growth from APP-410

Slide 2 – Milestones
- QA milestone: 2025-11-15
- Pilot for Feature X: 2025-11-24
- API Launch: 2025-11-28

Slide 3 – APP-410 Optimize API
- Deployed: 2025-11-18
- P95 latency: ~410ms → ~330ms (~20% reduction)
- Impact: Better experience for early Feature X testers

Slide 4 – APP-412 Feature X rollout
- Status: In QA
- Plan: Pilot (incl. FinSync Corp from ticket CS-9821) then GA at launch

Slide 5 – Open Questions
- Any blockers to 2025-11-28 launch?
- Additional metrics to track in weekly report?"
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_api_launch_meeting_availability_2025_11",
      "name": "API Launch – Planning Sync Scheduling (Nov 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-17T11:15:00+09:00",
      "content": "Tab: Availability
Columns: Name, 2025-11-19 10:00–11:00, 2025-11-20 15:00–16:00, Notes
Alice Kim, Available, Available, Prefers mornings but can do Thu afternoon
Min Lee, Busy, Available, Infra reviews Wed morning
Tom Park, Available, Available, Proposed 45-min sync
Dana Choi, Tentative, Tentative, Optional attendee

Conclusion: Hold API Launch Planning Sync on 2025-11-20, 15:00–15:45 KST (Zoom)."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_feature_x_rollout_plan_APP_412",
      "name": "Feature X Rollout Plan – APP-412",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-18T10:25:00+09:00",
      "content": "Feature X Rollout Plan (APP-412)
Owner: Alice Kim

Summary
Feature X rollout for external customers as part of the API Launch (APP project).

Timeline
- QA completion target: 2025-11-21
- Pilot customers: starting 2025-11-24 (includes FinSync Corp from CS-9821)
- General availability (GA): 2025-11-28 with API Launch

Details
- Jira: APP-412 (status: In QA, fixVersion: API Launch 2025-11-28)
- Dependencies: APP-410 optimizations, metrics dashboards updated

Customer Communication
- Support ticket CS-9821 (FinSync Corp): provide ETA with above milestones.
- Note: Emphasize that dates assume no critical QA issues.

Monitoring
- Track adoption among pilot customers
- Watch P95 latency and error rate as Feature X usage ramps."
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_cs_issues_feature_x_tracking",
      "name": "Customer Tickets – Feature X / APP-412 Tracking",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-18T11:10:00+09:00",
      "content": "Tab: CS-FeatureX
Columns: Ticket ID, Customer, Topic, Mapped Jira, Status, Notes
CS-9821, FinSync Corp, ETA for Feature X in API launch, APP-412, Pending Customer, Dana replied with pilot 2025-11-24 and GA 2025-11-28 based on APP-412.

Tab: Summary
- Total Feature X tickets this week: 3
- Most common question: ETA and rollout phases.
- Reference doc: "Feature X Rollout Plan – APP-412"."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_support_macro_feature_x_eta",
      "name": "Support Macro – Feature X ETA (APP-412)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-18T11:20:00+09:00",
      "content": "Support Macro: Feature X ETA (APP-412)
Owner: Dana Choi

Use this macro when customers ask about when Feature X will be available in production.

Template:
“Thanks for reaching out about Feature X.

Feature X is currently in final QA (tracked internally as APP-412). Our current plan is:
- QA completion target: 2025-11-21
- Enablement for a small set of pilot customers starting 2025-11-24
- General availability as part of our API launch on 2025-11-28

These dates assume no critical issues are found in QA.”

Example
- Ticket CS-9821 (FinSync Corp) answered using this macro on 2025-11-18."
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_api_launch_metrics_export_2025_11_21",
      "name": "API Launch Metrics Export – Week of 2025-11-17",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T09:20:00+09:00",
      "content": "Tab: Latency
Date, P95 Latency (ms)
2025-11-14, 410
2025-11-21, 328
Note: APP-410 deployed on 2025-11-18 → ~20% reduction.

Tab: Weekly Active API Consumers
Week Start, Active API Consumers
2025-11-10, 1250
2025-11-17, 1350
WoW Growth: +8%

Used as source data for "API Launch - Weekly Update (2025-11-21)"."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_weekly_api_launch_update_2025_11_21",
      "name": "API Launch - Weekly Update (2025-11-21)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T10:05:00+09:00",
      "content": "API Launch - Weekly Update (Week of 2025-11-17)
Owner: Tom Park

1. Highlights
- Latency improvements: After deploying APP-410, P95 latency dropped from ~410ms to ~330ms (approx. 20% reduction) across our main endpoints.
- Usage growth: Weekly active API consumers increased from 1,250 to 1,350 (+8% WoW), mainly driven by partners testing Feature X.

2. Delivery Status
- APP-410 (Optimize API): Status = Done. Deployed on 2025-11-18, monitoring looks good.
- APP-412 (Feature X rollout): Status = In QA. On track for pilot rollout 2025-11-24 and GA on 2025-11-28.

3. Risks & Mitigations
- Need to closely watch latency on write-heavy endpoints as more users adopt Feature X.

4. Next Week
- Final QA sign-off for APP-412
- Prepare launch runbook for 2025-11-28
"
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_exec_summary_api_launch_2025_11_21",
      "name": "Exec Summary – API Launch Weekly Highlights (2025-11-21)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T11:15:00+09:00",
      "content": "Exec Summary – API Launch (Week of 2025-11-17)
Prepared by: Dana Choi

Key Wins
- Performance: P95 API latency improved ~20% WoW (410ms → 330ms) following APP-410 deployment on 2025-11-18.
- Adoption: Weekly active API consumers increased ~8% WoW (1,250 → 1,350) as partners begin testing Feature X.

Delivery
- APP-410 (Optimize API): Done and stable.
- APP-412 (Feature X rollout): In QA, tracking to:
  - QA complete by 2025-11-21
  - Pilot (incl. FinSync Corp) 2025-11-24
  - GA with 2025-11-28 API launch.

Risks
- Any late QA issues on APP-412 could delay pilot, but not currently blocking launch.

Sources
- "API Launch - Weekly Update (2025-11-21)" (Tom)
- Metrics dashboard export (API Launch Metrics Export – Week of 2025-11-17)."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_api_launch_runbook_2025_11_28",
      "name": "API Launch Runbook – 2025-11-28",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T10:45:00+09:00",
      "content": "API Launch Runbook – 2025-11-28
Owner: Tom Park

Scope
- APP-410 (Optimize API)
- APP-412 (Feature X rollout)

Pre-launch Checklist
- [x] APP-410 deployed and stable (latency improvement ~20%).
- [ ] APP-412 QA sign-off by 2025-11-21.
- [ ] Pilot customers (incl. FinSync Corp from CS-9821) enabled 2025-11-24.

Launch Day Steps (2025-11-28)
1. Confirm Feature X GA flag on.
2. Monitor P95 latency and error rates.
3. Coordinate with CS on Feature X ETA messaging (using support macro doc).

References
- Jira: APP-410, APP-412
- Weekly report: "API Launch - Weekly Update (2025-11-21)"."
    },
